Name: Lyney
Title: "Spectacle of Phantasmagoria" Lyney
Desc: Those flowers in the mirror... who are they for?
Source: Reward for inviting Lyney to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

13102.Name: Prop Arrow
13102.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], summons a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113101]</color>, and gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113102]</color>.\nIf this character has at least 6 HP, then they deal 1 $[K5] to themself.

K103.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>
K103.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C113102.Name: Prop Surplus
C113102.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113102]</color> can stack up to 3 times.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this character uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S13103]</color>:</color> +1 DMG for each <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113102]</color> stack. After the skill is finalized, consume all <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113102]</color>, healing 1 HP for this character per stack.

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

13104.Name: Wondrous Trick: Miracle Parade
13104.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113101]</color>, and gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113102]</color>.

K103.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>
K103.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C113102.Name: Prop Surplus
C113102.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113102]</color> can stack up to 3 times.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this character uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S13103]</color>:</color> +1 DMG for each <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113102]</color> stack. After the skill is finalized, consume all <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113102]</color>, healing 1 HP for this character per stack.
